georgian-lobio.title: Georgian Lobio
georgian-lobio.description: A hearty Georgian bean stew seasoned with traditional spices like coriander and blue fenugreek. This comforting dish is served warm with cornbread and pickled vegetables.
directions: Drain the soaked beans and place in a large pot with fresh water. Bring to a boil and simmer for 30-40 minutes until tender.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and spices to the skillet and cook for another 2 minutes until fragrant.
Drain the beans, reserving 1 cup of cooking liquid. Add beans to the skillet.
Mash some of the beans with a wooden spoon to create a creamy texture. Add reserved liquid as needed.
Stir in fresh cilantro and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with cornbread and pickled vegetables.

tofu-sandwich.title: Tofu Sandwich
tofu-sandwich.description: A satisfying sandwich featuring crispy pan-fried tofu, fresh vegetables, and a zesty vegan mayo spread. Perfect for a quick lunch or light dinner.
directions: Press tofu for 15 minutes, then slice into 1/4 inch thick pieces.
Marinate tofu slices in soy sauce and nutritional yeast for 5 minutes.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Cook tofu slices for 3-4 minutes per side until golden brown.
Toast the bread slices until golden.
Spread vegan mayo on bread slices.
Layer with crispy tofu, avocado slices, and salad greens.
